Class Message

java.lang.Object
  Message
Direct Known Subclasses:
Request, Response
public abstract class Message
extends Object

A Message object represents an HTML message in abstract.
A Message has a header comprising a start line, followed by zero or more header fields of the form '<name>:<value>', followed by a carriage return and line feed.
A Message may have a body. This is left to subclasses to implement.

Version:
16/2/2016
Author:
Stephan Jamieson
